channel.title: Silver Pin Kit
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Silver Pin Kit"

item.title: Re: Silver Pin Kit
item.content:encoded: its used like drinking a potion if you have one uses 0 appetite

item.title: Re: Silver Pin Kit
item.content:encoded: what does the party house have to do with the silver pin kit? are you talking about making the blue flower hairpin with the hairpin pieces or the silver pin kit which is gotten by mixing many silver petals then using the kit to get the silver hairpin?

item.title: Re: Silver Pin Kit
item.content:encoded: so, if I had got it before (party house) then I can't get it by mixing?

item.title: Re: Silver Pin Kit
item.content:encoded: You mix a silver pin piece with a silver pin piece to make silver pin kit. Then go to main screen down to one use items and it should be there, make sure its not in your bucket or something. also if you have made it before then you cannot make another.

item.title: Silver Pin Kit
item.content:encoded: How to "use" Silver Pin Kit? at Potion Mixing? Because it wasn't at "one-use items"â€¦
